pages.title: Capacity
pages.text: $(l:brewing/effects)Effects$(/l) each have a space requirement, add these ingredients, in order, to increase a brew's capacity.

pages.secret_text: $(t:This item is secret. Does not show in this book for a Player who didn't use it in a brew before)$(4)Secret$()$(/t)
pages.removes_ceiling_text: $(t:Brews can have infinitely many effects, but they can be augmented - in power or duration - a limited amount of times. Using this item disables this ceiling, allowing for very powerful brews)$(3)Removes Ceiling$()$(/t)
